message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a unique opportunity and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. Would you consider $13500? It's a compromise, and I believe it's still a good value for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still at $12000. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're firm on your price. I'm willing to come up slightly to $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12500, but I'm still at $12000. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you meet me at this price?
